titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for putting the lawes against Jesuites, Seminaries, and Popish priests, in execution.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty: and by the assigns of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Given at His Majesties palace of VVestminster, the eighth day of March, in the sixteenth yeer of His Majesties reign".
